mapper.select: select c.*,a.attributeDetailsName as TableTypeName,b.attributeDetailsName as uOMName from canzhuoyuding c INNER JOIN attributedetails a on c.TableTypeID=a.id INNER JOIN attributedetails b on c.uOMID =b.id

select c.*,a.attributeDetailsName as commodityTypeName,b.attributeDetailsName as uOMName from canzhuoyuding c INNER JOIN attributedetails a on c.TableTypeID=a.id INNER JOIN attributedetails b on c.uOMID =b.id WHERE TableNumber like CONCAT('%',#{TableNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and TableTypeID=#{TableTypeID,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit #{start},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from canzhuoyuding c INNER JOIN attributedetails a on c.TableTypeID=a.id INNER JOIN attributedetails b on c.uOMID =b.id WHERE TableNumber like CONCAT('%',#{TableNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and TableTypeID=#{TableTypeID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM canzhuoyuding Where TableNumber=#{TableNumber}

select c.*,a.attributeDetailsName as TableTypeName,b.attributeDetailsName as uOMName from canzhuoyuding c INNER JOIN attributedetails a on c.TableTypeID=a.id INNER JOIN attributedetails b on c.uOMID =b.id WHERE TableNumber like CONCAT('%',#{TableNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and TableTypeID=#{TableTypeID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
